Welcome to FIMserv's documentation!Â¶

This framework presents a streamlined, user-friendly, and cloud-enabled pipeline to generate operational flood inundation maps using the NOAA Office of Water Prediction (OWP) Height Above Nearest Drainage (HAND) Flood Inundation Mapping (FIM) framework. It is developed under the Surface Dynamics Modeling Lab (SDML) as part of a project funded by the Cooperative Institute for Research to Operations in Hydrology (CIROH).
